Name: Stadium "Speedy Snack" Round Stool
Desc: Small, cheap, and mass-production-friendly round stone stools that can be found in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame's Chuwen Fair, Sip of Xocolatl, and other places, mostly positioned near a bar or a square table. Some Stadium vendors focus on providing fast-food services, especially on tournament days or during events when customer traffic surges and seating demand increases. To meet this need despite space constraints, they prefer small, cost-effective stools over traditional cushioned or backrest-equipped chairs. They are hardly as comfortable as those decked-out chairs, but they are sufficient for customers who mainly aim to eat quickly and return to watching the event, making the lack of comfort a minor issue.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
